full_text: https://abc13.com/sources-jeffrey-epstein-dies-by-suicide-in-manhattan-jail/5457853/ Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Date: 8/10/19 8:58 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6) @bop.gov Cc: Lee Plourde (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov, "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: Fwd: Here is the draft press release that I'll email to Mike & Lee momentarily from my Samsung assuming it refreshes quickly >> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) 08/10/2019 08:58 >>> Lamine, I am working with IPPA to finalize the press release (1st draft attached). Can you please give me answers to the below: (b)(5) Thanks, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Page 4991 DOJ-OGR-00024388

text_blocks.content: Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Subject: Fwd: Here is the draft press release that I'll email to Mike & Lee momentarily from my Samsung assuming it refreshes quickly
I am working with IPPA to finalize the press release (1st draft attached). Can you please give me answers to the below:

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6), (b)(7)(C), and (b)(5). The content of the email is related to finalizing a press release regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death.
